TopicTitle: Stock VTOL - reasonably flyable without ASAS

Articles.Content:
fiddling around with vertical take off rockets, I found out that the wings however shoehorned into the game they are, do exhibit real effects with regards to lift and angle of attack. Therefore it for some reason inspired me for how to built a pretty sweet VTOL.

Essentially angled wings assist with getting a good foward speed, and giving a tad more lift on landings with forward speed. It flies unbeleivably forgivingly, but is pretty tricky to get fine control with when you come in for landing. (so oddly, the easiest yet most difficult to fly thing I\'ve made perhaps.)

The video is somewhat inspired by - well if you know this style you\'ll know. Otherwise you\'ll think me strange ???

I may possibly have overwritten the save of the best working version of this, but I could upload if there is enough interest perhaps.

one peice of advice though, pulling up will slow you down, but it\'ll also make you drop like a stone!

I\'d imagine similar designs might be popular because they are simple to build, just annoying to configure. Strangely, this one was right straight off the bat.

I\'ll have another upload in a few days, just been messing with a few modpacks including fixcamera, damnedaerospace and damnedrobotics, and made one kickass little plane in it. That\'ll be up once I\'ve edited the video to go with it. 8)
